name: FCM recycling
overview:
FCM Recycling is a Canadian leader in safe electronic waste disposal. FCM provides corporate and government clients with an environmentally ethical e-waste solution that does not rely on landfills. Our continuing initiative is to constantly invest in new and advanced recycling technologies, which allow FCM to be at the forefront of industry standards and regulations.

Our facilities, located in Ontario, British Columbia ,Qu√©bec and Nova Scotia, are audited to EPSC standards by the Recycler Qualification Office; assuring that your electronic materials are recycled securely and ethically.

In addition, we provide a Certificate of Data Destruction, which insures total destruction of your confidential information and proprietary technologies (available upon request).

Contact us today and find out how we can help solve your e-waste challenges.
